text: Need Chloe Lewis for Target campaign. Budget around $8,499, looking for 1 x Instagram post, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Facebook post, 2 x 60-second YouTube video, 1 x Pinterest pin. 7 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
